quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因"money"（钱）和"-ed"（具有...的）的字面联想，将"moneyed"误理解为"关于钱的"或"赚钱的"，而非其核心义"富有的"。
quiz_item.sentence: The charity gala was hosted by a **moneyed** family, who donated millions to support education for underprivileged children.

option.definition: 富有的，有钱的（having a lot of money）
赚钱的（earning a lot of money）
省钱的（saving a lot of money）
